name: look
posTip: A word that describes an action, condition or experience.

dsense.name: look
dsense.posTip: A word that describes an action, condition or experience.

trans_examp.trans_en: to direct your eyes in order to see

example.eg: Look! There's grandma.
They looked at the picture and laughed.
example.egtrans: 他们看了看那幅画，笑了起来。

example.eg: Look at all these toys on the floor.
She looked up from her book and smiled at me.
example.egtrans: 她的视线从书本上移开，抬起头朝我笑了笑。

example.eg: I looked out (of) the window.
Look over there - there's a rainbow!

dsense.name: look
dsense.posTip: A word that describes an action, condition or experience.

trans_examp.trans_en: to try to find something or someone

example.eg: I'm looking for my keys.
I looked everywhere, but I couldn't find my glasses.
example.egtrans: 我每个地方都找遍了，可就是没找到我的眼镜。

example.eg: Have you looked in the dictionary?
I looked down the list but couldn't see his name.
example.egtrans: 我查看了名单，但没找到他的名字。

dsense.name: look
dsense.posTip: A word that describes an action, condition or experience.

example.eg: You look well!
The roads look very icy.
That dress looks nice on you.
He has started to look his age (= appear as old as he really is).
example.egtrans: 他看上去开始显年纪了。

example.eg: It's looking good (= things are going well).
He looked (like) a friendly sort of person.
example.egtrans: 他看起来是那种很友善的人。

example.eg: The twins look just like their mother.
example.egtrans: 那对双胞胎长得很像他们的母亲。

example.eg: She looked as if/though she hadn't slept all night.
example.egtrans: 她看起来似乎整晚都没有睡觉。

example.eg: It looks like rain (= as if it is going to rain).

dsense.name: look
dsense.posTip: A word that describes an action, condition or experience.

example.eg: The garden looks south.
This window looks out onto the lake.

dsense.name: look
dsense.posTip: A word that describes an action, condition or experience.

trans_examp.trans_en: used when you are telling someone to be careful or to pay attention

example.eg: Look where you're going!
Look at the time - we're late!
example.egtrans: 注意时间——我们已经晚了！

dsense.name: look
dsense.posTip: A word that describes an action, condition or experience.

dsense_body_def_block_kk.def: to be planning to do something

example.eg: I'm looking to start my own business.

name: look
posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

dsense.name: look
dsense.posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

trans_examp.trans_en: the act of looking at someone or something

example.eg: She gave him a look of real dislike.
Take a (good) look at this picture and see if you recognize anyone.
example.egtrans: 好好看看这张照片，看看能不能认出上面的什么人。

example.eg: Can I have a look at your dictionary?

dsense.name: look
dsense.posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

trans_examp.trans_en: the act of trying to find someone or something

example.eg: I had another look for the watch, but couldn't find it.
example.egtrans: 我又找了一遍手表，但没有找到。

dsense.name: look
dsense.posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

example.eg: She had a worried look about her.
She gave me a questioning look.
The look this year will be relaxed and casual.
example.egtrans: 今年的时尚是放松随意。

dsense_body_def_block_kk.def: the appearance of someone or something

example.eg: They liked the look of the hotel, but it was too expensive.
example.egtrans: 他们很喜欢酒店的样子，只是价格太贵了。

example.eg: I don't like the look of that fence (= it appears to have something wrong with it).
example.egtrans: 我不喜欢那道栅栏的样子。

dsense_body_def_block_kk.def: a person's appearance, especially how attractive they are

example.eg: I like her looks.
Her looks improved as she grew older.
example.egtrans: 年纪稍大一些后，她变得好看多了。

example.eg: He put on weight and started to lose his looks.
example.egtrans: 他胖了，而且开始长得越来越难看了。

name: look
posTip: A word or phrase that you say loudly or suddenly to express strong feelings.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 看看吧；瞧（用于表达愤怒）

example.eg: Look, I've already told you it's not possible.
example.egtrans: 看吧，我跟你说过这根本不可能。

example.eg: Look here, I've had enough of this.
